Can I change any or all of the profile information while modifying my profile?

You can change most of the information in your profile. However, some fields cannot be changed like first name, surname, date of birth and gender. Please be careful while you input this information in the registration form. You may contact the Customer Service team in case you require assistance regarding the same.
Will I be searchable online through Google, Yahoo etc?
No. We will show your full name only to registered users of Marwadi Shaadi, and your profile will not be discoverable through search engines by searching your full name.
Are there any tips to make a matrimonial profile more popular?
There are several things you can do to improve your chances of getting contacted.

\u2022\tAdd an attractive recent photo of yourself to your profile. This is the single most effective step you can take to generate high viewership and also be featured in "Photos only" search results.
\u2022\tTake time to fill your Personal Profile as accurately and completely as possible.

\u2022\tSpend time writing more about your qualitative aspects - aspirations and goals, attitude towards life, your family and your hobbies. Remember, people want to know more about yourself before they decide to express interest in you.

\u2022\tAdd your Partner Profile. If you do not have a Partner Profile, others viewing your profile will not know what kind of partner you are looking for. So, specify the qualities that you are looking for in your mate. Do not be unnecessarily restrictive in your choices. Make multiple selections within a category, if need be.
Can I deactivate my matrimonial profile temporarily?
Yes, you can from settings.
What is Marwadi Shaadi online chat facility?

With todays hectic lifestyle it becomes difficult for people to keep in touch and Marwadi Shaadi Messenger is a great 21st century way to meet and get to know your choosen one online. It is simple to use. Every time you log on to Marwadi Shaadi, you are automatically logged on to Marwadi Shaadi Messenger. You are visible on chat and can be contacted by a premium member who can initiate a chat with you. You can respond and take the conversation further if you are a premium member
What are the advantages of premium membership?

A Premium Membership means a paid membership to marwadihaadi.com. We have various packages and options to help you access advanced features of Marwadi Shaadi. A Premium Membership helps you find an ideal matrimony partner quickly and easily. 

•	Premium Members can View verified contact details of other members and can register on various sub-castes as compared to free members who can register on only one sub-caste. 

•	Premium Matrimonial Members can express interest and write messages to other members of Marwadi Shaadi Matrimonial. 

•	Premium Members can avail additional privacy settings for their phone, photo, display name and horoscope 

•	Premium Members will be allowed to view horoscope details of other profiles 

•	They can send their profile information along with the initial message written when expressing interest in another member which helps in increasing responses. 

•	Further, they are free to communicate with all other members who have accepted their initiation. 

•	Our data shows that the chances of finding a partner increase 12 times if a member upgrades to a premium membership. Premium members can also avail of special offers from Marwadi Shaadi that may not be available to free members.
Can I avail discounts while purchasing premium membership?

Marwadi Shaadi Matrimonial offers discounts to new Premium Membership registrations from time to time as part of its ongoing promotion plan. If you have received a promotional code you can enter it while placing your order and receive your discount. If not, we may not have any promotions running currently.
Is online Credit Card Payment on Marwadi Shaadi secure?

Yes, 100% Secure! Your credit card information is entered on a Secure Server using SSL Technology and 128 Bit Encryption which is one of the highest levels of security provided by websites. The information is transmitted in an encrypted fashion to our payment gateway and your card is charged online. Finally, to provide the highest level of security, we do not store your credit card information on our online server at any time.
How long does it take to activate my matrimonial account after I place an order?
If you pay for the order using a credit card, then the account is activated within 12 hours.

Mumbai-based, Marwadi Shaadi Matrimonial Services (MS) is a firm established in the year 2012 by Dr Mohan T Karwa.

The entity is engaged in providing online and offline matrimonial services to the Marwadi community. The portal is called www.marwadishaadi.com and it is meant for all Marwadis, including the Oswals, Khandelwals, Jains and Maheshwari’s.

In addition to the portal, the entity also provides an exclusive offline service viz “Elite Marwadi Shaadi”. Elite Marwadi Shaadi is a personalized and premium service, offered to prospective brides and grooms, who desire to find a life-partner with very specific preferences. Criteria can include specific cities, elite class, family background, education and others.

MS has an efficient and young backend office team comprising of tele callers, technical and skilled staff.

Website has a huge database of around 10,000 online profiles from all over India especially for the close knit Marwadi community. It also has vast offline profiles who enjoy personalized services of MS. Online portal offers has a wide range of new features like instant horoscope matching, online chat and others. The portal offers quarterly, half yearly and yearly packages for its members, which entitles the paid members to benefits like screening through profiles, communicating with prospective members and others. The member has access to online and offline payment options. The entity has been improving its presence in cities like Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad and others, and has been participating in several matrimonial and social events all over India.

The main promoter-founder Dr Mohan T Karwa, aged 65 years, has been the visionary of Marwadi Shaadi. Although Doctor by profession he has a vast experience of about four decades in diverse fields like construction, medical, finance and real estate. Having relinquished his Government service, he ventured into the Government infrastructure / construction contracts for roads, bridges and others in the state of Maharashtra. He gained reasonable experience in public sector and subsequently ventured into private sector. He successfully built various residential and commercial projects in Thane, Jalgaon, Pune and others. Later in 2009, Dr Karwa diversified into service sector through his brain-child, Marwadi Shaadi Matrimonial Services.

Our second generation entrepreneur and well known face of MS, Mr Rishi Karwa, aged 26 years, is an MBA - Finance, and has taken the operations of MS to a new level of growth with a modern outlook. He is actively involved in all social and community activities in Mumbai and Maharashtra. He has a well-established circle of friends, partners and collaborations all over the country which takes care of business development. He also has about five years of experience in real estate and service industry. Operations of the firm are primarily managed by Mr Rishi Karwa, while other partners extend support in finance and marketing activities.
Mrs Aruna Karwa, aged 57 years, is a Graduate and is involved in promotion and marketing activities of the entity.
CA. Sareeka Kasat, aged 36 years, is a Chartered Accountant and possesses 9 years of experience in the finance sector. She takes care of the backend operations of the portal.
Mrs Swati N Mantri, aged 34 years is an MBA and has 5 years rich experience in Credit rating and Analysis. She looks after the Pune branch office of MS.
Mr Jayesh Malpani, aged 24 years, is civil engineer and post graduate in Construction management is a budding entrepreneur and takes care of promotional activities of MS.

Marwadi Shaadi offers a 100% refund if members do not get any response within 60 days. To be eligible for the refund, members should fulfill the following:
1. Upload atleast one photo.
2. Contact a minimum of 50 members.
3. Log in to your account consistently for 30 days.
Inspite of fulfilling these requirements.
1. If members do not get a reply to their Personalised Messages.
2. If members are not contacted by other members.
3. If members do not view or take any verified contact numbers.
4. If others do not view or take your contact number.

Marwadishaadi.com is an online matrimonial portal endeavouring constantly to provide all Marwadis with premium matrimonial services under one roof. Our commitment to your right to privacy extends beyond this privacy statement wherein we value the information we collect from you and keep it completely confidential.

We gather information from members and guests who apply for the matrimonial services our site offers. It includes email address, first name, last name, a user-specified password, mailing address, zip code and telephone number or fax number. Apart from these, we may also collect some detailed information about your interests and background to help you find a better match.

We collect information from our clients primarily to ensure that we are able to fulfill your requirements and to deliver a personalised experience so that the matchmaking process becomes easier and fulfilling for you.

The information collected from our clients is shared only with members of Marwadishaadi.com or members of our partners. Any information you give us is held with the utmost care and security. We are also bound to cooperate fully should a situation arise where we are required by law or legal process to provide information about a customer.

The marwadishaadi.com team will contact you from time to time to acquaint you with various features and functionalities of the website. They will contact you for either "Service" or "Sales" through a variety of media like E-mail, SMS, MMS, Voice IVR, USSD, WAP messages, Telephonic Calls, etc. The calls made to you will be from a regular mobile or landline number which is not of the "140" series.

We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time based on your comments or as a result of a change of policy in our company. If you have any questions regarding our Privacy Statement, please write in to admin@marwadishaadi.com

1. Marwadi Shaadi Matrimonial Services is a partnership firm based in Thane, Mumbai

2. Personal Details and Photos are not verified by the website on personal basis. Members/Users are requested to make thorough inquiries before proceeding any further.

3. Marwadi Shaadi would not be liable for any kind of claims / compensation arising out of post-marriage accidents, divorce or similar unfortunate events.
